Mission.Name: Test out the Prototype
Mission.Description:
Good morning Commander, Today we have been entrusted to test out the new prototype they have been developing for the Battleship Iowa.
The new prototype looks very slick, but be aware that any issues are due to the prototype status. Be sure to note any issues you see, and make sure to tell the scientist about any issues.
Make us proud out there commander.
Admiral John Doe.
